notes: Acme Technologies is our biggest prospect this quarter. They want a full IntelForge enterprise deployment with custom Slack integration, RAG pipeline for internal docs, and a KPI dashboard. CTO Ali Hassan visited our office on February 10th. Contract expected to close by end of Q1 2026. They have 350 employees and need multi-tenant support.

Beta Ventures is a mid-size VC firm. They need IntelForge to analyze portfolio company reports, investor memos, and quarterly earnings. Sara Ahmed is the main point of contact. They specifically asked for SWOT analysis on demand and automated KPI tracking. GDPR compliance is mandatory — they are very strict about data privacy. Demo was given on February 15th and was well received.

Gamma AI Labs is a Silicon Valley AI startup. They build LLM products and want IntelForge as their internal knowledge management backbone. Dr. Usman Malik is an ex-Google researcher. They need Gmail ingestion for team emails, Slack ingestion for R&D discussions, and Pinecone-based semantic search. NDA signed on February 1st. Legal team currently reviewing the master service agreement.

Delta Logistics is a UK-based supply chain company. They want to use IntelForge to process supplier contracts, shipping documents, and customs paperwork. Omar Farooq joined the call on February 18th and was interested in the PDF ingestion feature. Main concern is accuracy of extraction from scanned documents. They run SAP for ERP — potential integration point. Deal size might grow if pilot is successful.

Epsilon Healthcare is running a 30-day pilot of IntelForge for processing patient intake forms, clinical trial reports, and regulatory submissions. Dr. Ayesha Qureshi is leading the evaluation. Biggest concern is HIPAA compliance and PII protection — our anonymization layer was a key selling point. Pilot started February 10th. IT team needs VPN-level access control for the RAG queries.

Zeta Education Group runs online learning platforms across Pakistan. Sana Tariq is evaluating IntelForge to power a Q&A assistant for students based on course materials. They have 50,000+ student users. Budget is tight but potential for a large volume license renewal. Integration with their LMS (Moodle) is needed. First call was encouraging — they liked the Gemini-powered retrieval demo.

Eta Real Estate wants to digitize their property contracts, valuation reports, and legal documents. Bilal Chaudhry was referred by a mutual contact. They currently store everything in physical files and are looking to modernize. First email sent February 19th. No meeting scheduled yet. This could be a quick win given the simple use case.

Theta Retail Solutions is a retail analytics firm serving 200+ stores in Pakistan. CRO Kamran Iqbal wants IntelForge to power their business analyst team with automated sales report summaries, vendor contract analysis, and weekly KPI digests. Demo is scheduled for February 26th. They need integration with their existing Power BI dashboards. Annual contract preferred.

Iota Media Group publishes 5 online news portals and 3 print magazines. Zara Hussain wants IntelForge to help journalists search across 10 years of archived articles, press releases, and interview transcripts. They are looking for semantic search and summarization capabilities. Content volume is massive — estimated 2 million+ documents. Negotiating on storage and API call pricing.

Kappa Manufacturing is one of Pakistan's largest textile exporters. COO Tariq Mahmood wants IntelForge to manage ISO compliance documents, audit reports, and machine maintenance manuals. They have factories in Lahore, Faisalabad, and Karachi generating thousands of documents per month. The proposal includes a multi-site deployment with role-based access control. They need offline capability for factory floors with limited internet.
